it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties

Class SimpleProperty<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.Property<V>
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.SimpleProperty<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value hold by the property.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProtectedProperty, ReplicatingProperty

    public class SimpleProperty<V>
extends Property<V>
    The class provides a basic concretization of Property. It can operate as it is and can take care of values and listeners for inheriting classes.
